meta.name: viewport

span.span: MAS Charter Schools' Continuous Learning Plan

Continuous learning starts up Monday, April 6! Students and parents, you'll hear from your teachers virtually at least once a week as you progress in your school work from home. For more information on our continuous learning plan, links to resources, and how to reach out with questions, check out the documents and links here.
Josh Harrelson - Elementary Assistant Principal, Yale Campus josh.harrelson@mascharterschool.com, 505-507-6735
Rosa Swonger - Elementary Assistant Principal, Old Coors Campus, rosa.swonger@mascharterschool.com, 505-800-1852
Angela Murray - Middle School Assistant Principal, Middle School, angela.murray@mascharterschool.com, 505-710-5955
Michele Platis - Middle School Assistant Principal, michele.platis@mascharterschool.com, 505-463-7347
Jenn Prye - High School Assistant Principal, jenn.prye@mascharterschool.com, 505-710-6249
Jenn Peña - Special Education Director, jenn.pena@mascharterschool.com

p.span: Need help during coronavirus (COVID-19) closures? Our social worker is staying up-to-date on resources; we'll update them here as things change. Make sure to check in with local media and stay informed on state announcements here too.
Check out the resources below and share with your friends, family, and neighbors. Stay healthy--and stay calm. Our community is here to help!

span.span: Poor connection? No connection? No problem! The City of Albuquerque's WiFi on Wheels program has set up more than a dozen locations for free outdoor wireless internet access. See them on a map and learn how to connect to them here:
